dcterms:description: The book dataset consists of the full text from 29 books written by 4 different authors, including works from J.K. Rowling, C. S. Lewis, George R. R. Martin, and Stephenie Meyer. The dataset aims to capture series-specific tendencies in word usage while eliminating series-specific words.
dcterms:title: Book Dataset

dcterms:description: The politics dataset is a collection of comments made in 2016 in 6 different subreddits on Reddit, selected to analyze the effects of covariates on word usage in political discussions.
dcterms:title: Politics Dataset
